exec: pm.collectionVariables.set('phoneNumber', "0931895560"); //Users ekyc approved and signed Contract
// Call API re_login after login multi session

query: "mutation ($input: ReLoginInput) {
  re_login(input: $input) {
    api_client {
      access_token
      ip_address
      refresh_token
      user {
        id
        ip_address
        uid
        email
        phone
        first_name
        last_name
        status
        has_pin_code
        pin_type
        pin_blocking_duration
        pin_allowed_attempts
        freshchat_restore_id
        avatar
        confirm_contract
        contract_signed_at
        kyc {
          status
          address
          passport_issue_date
          passport_issue_place
          document_type
          document_number
          idcard_issue_date
          idcard_issue_place
          idcard_type
          cmnd
          first_name
          manual_review
          last_name
          full_name
          idcard_back_page
          idcard_front_page
          __typename
        }
        user_credits {
          id
          reward_balance
          expired_at
          __typename
        }
        documents {
          url
          created_at
          __typename
        }
        verified_phone
        verified_email
        referral_code
        referral_url
        custom_referral_code
        bank_info {
          bank_name
          bank_city
          bank_branch
          account_number
          account_owner
          bank_support
          verified
          __typename
        }
        referred_code
        created_at
        discourse {
          is_sign_up
          sign_up_at
          __typename
        }
        completed_challenge
        synced_ii_at
        pin_unblock_at
        pin_enable_manual_unblock
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    flow
    __typename
  }
}"

body.raw:
{
    "operationName": "signin_v2",
    "variables": {
        "email": "{{phoneNumber}}",
        "password": "{{password}}",
        "fcm_token": "{{$guid}}:APA91bFVsdSihx4iIvzKHqkmnSg15GpP2QyQwvMx6-Zrj-A3b9OGozt1Sg2NNdr0mfqBGENGhDyt8Dh0P_XEi6gjrDP0D-yyOjErOUtY8KNZ__gu0LP3rHs",
        "app_instance_id": "{{$guid}}",
        "platform":"PostmanTest"
    },
    "query":"mutation signin_v2($email: String, $password: String, $app_instance_id: String, $fcm_token: String, $platform: String) {
  signin_v2(
    input: {email: $email, password: $password, app_instance_id: $app_instance_id, fcm_token: $fcm_token, platform: $platform}
  ) {
    access_token
    ip_address
    refresh_token
    user {
      id
      ip_address
      uid
      email
      phone
      first_name
      last_name
      status
      has_pin_code
      pin_type
      pin_blocking_duration
      pin_allowed_attempts
      freshchat_restore_id
      avatar
      confirm_contract
      contract_signed_at
      kyc {
        status
        address
        passport_issue_date
        passport_issue_place
        document_type
        document_number
        idcard_issue_date
        idcard_issue_place
        idcard_type
        cmnd
        first_name
        manual_review
        last_name
        full_name
        idcard_back_page
        idcard_front_page
        __typename
      }
      user_credits {
        id
        reward_balance
        expired_at
        __typename
      }
      documents {
        url
        created_at
        __typename
      }
      verified_phone
      verified_email
      referral_code
      referral_url
      custom_referral_code
      bank_info {
        bank_name
        bank_city
        bank_branch
        account_number
        account_owner
        bank_support
        verified
        __typename
      }
      referred_code
      created_at
      discourse {
        is_sign_up
        sign_up_at
        __typename
      }
      completed_challenge
      synced_ii_at
      pin_unblock_at
      pin_enable_manual_unblock
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}"}

body.raw:
{
    "operationName": "orders",
    "variables": {
        "first": 10,
        "reverse": true,
        "sort_keys": "CREATED_AT",
        "query": "status:QUEUED,PENDING_ACCEPTED"
    },
    "query": "query orders($after: String, $before: String, $first: Int, $last: Int, $reverse: Boolean, $sort_keys: OrderSortKeys, $query: String) {
  orders(
    after: $after
    before: $before
    first: $first
    last: $last
    reverse: $reverse
    sort_keys: $sort_keys
    query: $query
  ) {
    edges {
      cursor
      node {
        id
        created_at
        updated_at
        instrument
        quantity
        executed_quantity
        matching_price
        total_amount_placed
        reward_amount
        total_pending_amount
        status
        price
        origin
        tax_amount
        matching_type
        bidask_type
        cancellable_at
        matching_time
        commission
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    nodes {
      id
      created_at
      updated_at
      instrument
      quantity
      executed_quantity
      matching_price
      total_amount_placed
      reward_amount
      total_pending_amount
      status
      price
      origin
      tax_amount
      matching_type
      bidask_type
      cancellable_at
      matching_time
      commission
      __typename
    }
    page_info {
      start_cursor
      end_cursor
      has_next_page
      has_previous_page
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}"
}
